Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.reply

Interface Summary
IAeDurableReplyFactory Interface for the factory which is responsible for recreating reply receivers using the prototype pattern.
IAeDurableReplyInfo Contains durable reply information.
IAeReplyReceiver The callback object for Reply activities.
IAeReplyReceiverFactory Factory that creates a reply receiver given its properties.
IAeTransmissionTracker Interface for the Invoke and Reply transmission and receive id tracker.
 

Class Summary
AeDurableReplyInfo Basic implementation of a durable reply info.
AeMissingReplyReceiver Implements the receiver for the reply to an inbound receive when the system went down before the reply happened.
AeQueueManagerReplyReceiver A reply receiver that delegates to a matching non-durable reply receiver maintained by the queue manager.
AeReplyReceiverBase Base implementation of the reply receiver.
AeWaitableReplyReceiver Class used to handle the reply in a request response operation.
 

Exception Summary
AeMissingReplyReceiverException Implements an exception that reports a missing reply receiver.
AeUnknownReplyReceiver Exception that is used to indicate that a IAeReplyReceiver implementation for a given durable reply type was not found.
